predicate.note: Frames file for 'snort' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 38 and 40.2, Framenet entries Communication noise and Perception noise.

roleset.name: emit a snorting sound, say snortingly

example.name: as 'speak'
example.text: ``Big business,'' Mr. Pawlowski snorts [*T*-1] in English.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: When he laughs, John snorts like a pig.

example.name: drug use?
example.text: John used *trace* to snort Coke, but the bubbles irritated his sinuses.
